name: Advent of the Ancient Steel Angel
effect: [Main] You may play 1 [Ankylomon] or [Angemon] from your hand without paying the cost. Then, 2 of your Digimon may DNA digivolve into a Digimon card in your hand. If this effect DNA digivolved, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞.
securityEffect: [Security] You may play 1 [Armadillomon] or [Patamon] from your hand or trash without paying the cost. Then, add this card to the hand.

name: DORU-Din
effect: [Main] If you have a Digimon with [Dorugoramon] in its name, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers with a play cost of 4 or less. Then, delete all of your opponent's Digimon with the lowest play cost.

name: The Demon Wolf of the Castle of Nine Wolves
effect:
[Main] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [SoC] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. If this effect added to a hand, trash 1 card in your hand. Then, place this card in the battle area.
[Main] ＜Delay＞
・You may play 1 card with the [SoC] trait from your trash with the play cost reduced by 2.
securityEffect: [Security] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with the [SoC] trait among them to the hand. Return the rest to the bottom of the deck. If this effect added to a hand, trash 1 card in your hand. Then, place this card in the battle area.

name: Thunderflame Crusher
effect:
While you have a Digimon or Tamer with [Pulsemon] in its text, you may ignore this card's color requirements.
When this card would be used, by trashing cards from the top of your security stack, up to having 3 left, reduce the cost by 2 for each card trashed.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's level 5 or lower Digimon. Then, if you have 2 or fewer security cards, place this card at the bottom of your security stack.
securityEffect: [Security] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -15000 DP for the turn.

name: Rapidmon (X Antibody)
effect:
[Digivolve] [Rapidmon]: Cost 4
＜Armor Purge＞
[When Digivolving] Suspend all of your opponent’s Digimon. Then, this Digimon may attack.
[All Turns] While [Rapidmon] or [X Antibody] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, all of your opponent's suspended Digimon get -4000 DP.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted in battle or by having 0 DP, gain 2 memory.

effect:

[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon is deleted in battle or by having 0 DP, gain 2 memory.

name: Magnamon (X Antibody)
effect:
[Digivolve] 2-color w/[Magnamon] in name: Cost 5
＜Blocker＞＜Armor Purge＞
[When Digivolving] If [Magnamon (X Antibody)] or an [Armor Form] trait card is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, until the end of your opponent's turn, this Digimon gets +3000 DP and isn't affected by your opponent's effects. Then, unsuspend it.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a card is removed from a security stack, you may activate 1 of this Digimon's [When Digivolving] effects.
(Rule) Trait: Has [Free] attribute.
